background.label: Background image
background.description: Image covering the background of the board game.

introduction.label: Introduction page
introduction.description: Introduction page shown when game is started

startButtonText.description: Text for the start/continue button on the intro page

loadScreen.label: Loading image
loadScreen.description: Image shown while resources are loaded.

hotspots.label: Hotspots
hotspots.description: List of hotspots in the game window where questions are found.

title.label: Title
title.description: Title for hotspot. Will be displayed on hover

image.label: Hotspot image
image.description: Image used for the hotspot when the user has not completed the minigame.

passedImage.label: Hotspot passed image
passedImage.description: Image used for hotspot when user has passed the minigame

failedImage.label: Hotspot failed image
failedImage.description: Image used for hotspot when user has passed the minigame

action.label: Action
action.description: What to do when clicking this hotspot

extras.label: Extra stuff
extras.description: Extra content provided through H5P libraries

incremental.description: Whether to incrementally step through the progress images, or to show image specifically for each hotspot.

includeFailed.description: Whether to count minigame as answered in progress even if not passed.
